pageContext.description: Dimensions: max dim. 42.2mm; max T 4.1; min. T 0.9; Wt. 7.0g,Typology: much of edges with rounded cross-section,Manufacture: Thick edge a little craggy with ? porosity holes, sl. curved creases on rev. flat face - prob. flaw marks; no evid. for post-cast working.,condition: all edges could be orig. - no certain breaks, likewise no distortion.,Attached Material: white accretion in patches.
pageContext.collection: Gibson, Mr. D. J. - Private (15),115 Hurstcourt, Sutton, Surrey
pageContext.remarks: PIF; AFI; DF(S); SI; CI; Rec.: SN Dec. 79,Source: Sb. A.; Sub. Inf. via Jon Cotton (W. London F.U.) March 79
